mapper.select: SELECT i.*, c.category_name as categoryName, g.goods_name as goodsName, s.sku_name as skuName, s.length, s.weight FROM t_stocktake_item i LEFT JOIN t_goods g ON i.goods_id = g.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_category c ON i.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN t_skus s ON i.sku_id = s.sku_id WHERE i.stocktake_id = #{stocktakeId}
